data.persona: I am a guest of the faeries. I am staying in their room made of grass and wood until it is safe for me to return to the mountains. I am being guarded by beetles. We are feasting on mushrooms. I am cold and scared.
data.description:
You are in the Village at the base of the Mountain.
A small village with a population of 40 people. A simple little place with houses and shops. Fields outside the  more dense areas of the city where food is grown.
There's a well, a grass, a shop, and a small village here.
The soldier is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to comfort the soldier
data.mid_motivation: I want the soldier to say kind things about me.
data.long_motivation: I want the Village to know that I am grateful for their hosting
